runController() - Method in class client.controller.LoginFrameController
runTheController handles all button actions from the login frame, and initiate calls to other methods to continue the program
runController() - Method in class client.controller.MenuFrameController
runTheController handles all button actions from the MenuFrame, and initiates calls to other methods if the appropriate button is called (eg if "register for course" button is pressed, it creates a frame to allow the user to register for a course)
runController() - Method in class client.controller.RegisterForCourseController
runTheController handles all button actions from the RegisterForCourseFrame, and initiates calls to other methods if the appropriate button is called (eg if "cancel" button is pressed, it deletes the frame)
runController() - Method in class client.controller.ServerMessageController
runTheController handles all button actions from the ServerMessageFrame, and initiates calls to other methods if the appropriate button is called (eg if the "OK" button is pressed, it deletes the frame)
runController() - Method in class client.controller.ViewAllCoursesController
runTheController handles all button actions from the ViewAllCoursesFrame, and initiates calls to other methods if the appropriate button is called (eg if "Back" button is pressed, it deletes the frame)
runController() - Method in class client.controller.ViewRegisteredController
runTheController handles all button actions from the ViewRegisteredFrame, and initiates calls to other methods if the appropriate button is called (eg if "back" button is pressed, it deletes the frame)
runGUI() - Method in class client.view.GUI
runGUI() is called form client and creates the login frame necessary to continue using the program, and gather necessary information about the user (Student id).
